sections.heading: What is 〜たらどう?
sections.content:
〜たらどう (or more politely 〜たらどうですか ) is used to make suggestions, meaning "how about" or "why don't you." It's a casual way to give advice or propose ideas.

休んだらどう？ "How about resting?" 医者に行ったらどうですか "How about going to the doctor?" もっと勉強したらどう？ "How about studying more?"

children.heading: Pattern: Verb た-form + らどう(ですか)
children.content: | Verb | た-form | + らどう | | ------ | ------- | ------------ | | 見る | 見た | 見たらどう | | 食べる | 食べた | 食べたらどう | | 来る | 来た | 来たらどう | | する | した | したらどう | | 書く | 書いた | 書いたらどう | | 読む | 読んだ | 読んだらどう |

children.heading: Examples
children.content: 行く → 行ったらどう (How about going?) 話す → 話したらどう (How about talking?) 休む → 休んだらどう (How about resting?)

children.heading: Very casual: たらどう
children.content: 休んだらどう "How about resting?" やめたらどう "How about quitting?" Use with close friends only!

children.heading: Casual-polite: たらどうですか
children.content: 休んだらどうですか "How about resting?" 相談したらどうですか "How about consulting?" Most common everyday form

children.heading: More polite: たらいかがですか
children.content: お休みになったらいかがですか "How about resting?" (very polite) ご相談されたらいかがですか "How about consulting?" (very polite) Use in formal situations

children.heading: Making suggestions
children.content: 映画を見に行ったらどう？ "How about going to see a movie?" 早く寝たらどうですか "How about sleeping early?" 新しい仕事を探したらどう？ "How about looking for a new job?"

children.heading: Giving advice
children.content: もっと運動したらどうですか "How about exercising more?" 医者に相談したらどう？ "How about consulting a doctor?" 謝ったらどうですか "How about apologizing?"

children.heading: Example 1: Health Advice
children.content: A: 最近、すごく疲れてるんだ "I've been really tired lately" B: 少し休んだらどう？ "How about resting a bit?" A: そうだね。週末ゆっくりするよ "You're right. I'll relax this weekend"

children.heading: Example 2: Problem Solving
children.content: A: 彼氏と喧嘩しちゃった "I had a fight with my boyfriend" B: ちゃんと話し合ったらどうですか "How about talking it through properly?" A: そうですね。明日話してみます "You're right. I'll try talking tomorrow"

children.heading: Example 3: Study Advice
children.content: A: 試験が心配です "I'm worried about the exam" B: もっと勉強したらどうですか "How about studying more?" A: はい、頑張ります "Yes, I'll do my best"

children.heading: Mistake 1: Using dictionary form
children.content: Wrong: 行くたらどう ❌ Right: 行ったらどう ✓ "How about going?" Must use た-form!

children.heading: Mistake 2: Too casual with superiors
children.content: Wrong to boss: もっと考えたらどう ❌ Right: もう少しご検討されたらいかがですか ✓ "How about considering it more?" Know your audience!

children.heading: Mistake 3: Being too pushy
children.content: Can sound pushy: やめたらどう ⚠️ Softer: やめたらどうですか ⚠️ Even softer: やめることも考えてみたらどうですか ✓ "How about considering quitting?" Add softeners for sensitive topics!

sections.heading: When to Use たらどう

children.heading: Appropriate situations
children.content: ✓ Giving friendly advice ✓ Making casual suggestions ✓ Problem-solving discussions ✓ Health and lifestyle tips ✓ Among friends and family

children.heading: Be careful with
children.content: ⚠️ Sensitive personal matters ⚠️ Major life decisions ⚠️ With people you don't know well ⚠️ When advice wasn't asked for ⚠️ Superior-subordinate relationships

children.heading: もう少し (a bit more)
children.content: もう少し考えたらどうですか "How about thinking about it a bit more?"

children.heading: ちょっと (a little)
children.content: ちょっと休んだらどう？ "How about resting a little?"

children.heading: 一度 (once)
children.content: 一度医者に見てもらったらどうですか "How about seeing a doctor once?"

children.heading: 試しに (as a trial)
children.content: 試しにやってみたらどう？ "How about trying it as a trial?"

children.heading: Agreeing
children.content: そうだね "You're right" いい考えだね "That's a good idea" そうしてみるよ "I'll try that" そうします "I'll do that"

children.heading: Declining
children.content: うーん、どうかな "Hmm, I don't know" それはちょっと... "That's a bit..." 今は無理かな "It's impossible right now" 考えてみます "I'll think about it"

children.heading: Health suggestions
children.content: もっと寝たらどうですか "How about sleeping more?" 運動したらどう？ "How about exercising?" 野菜を食べたらどうですか "How about eating vegetables?" 病院に行ったらどう？ "How about going to the hospital?"

children.heading: Work/study suggestions
children.content: もっと勉強したらどう？ "How about studying more?" 先生に聞いたらどうですか "How about asking the teacher?" 転職を考えたらどう？ "How about considering a job change?" 休暇を取ったらどうですか "How about taking a vacation?"

children.heading: Relationship suggestions
children.content: 謝ったらどう？ "How about apologizing?" 正直に話したらどうですか "How about talking honestly?" もう一度考えたらどう？ "How about reconsidering?" 別れたらどうですか "How about breaking up?" (very direct!)

children.heading: Adding だって/から
children.content: 疲れてるんだから、休んだらどう？ "You're tired, so how about resting?" 時間がないんだから、タクシーで行ったらどうですか "You don't have time, so how about going by taxi?"

sections.heading: たらどう vs Other Suggestions

children.heading: たらどう (casual suggestion)
children.content: 映画を見たらどう？ "How about watching a movie?" Casual, friendly advice

children.heading: ませんか (invitation)
children.content: 映画を見ませんか "Won't you watch a movie?" Inviting them to join you

children.heading: ほうがいい (stronger advice)
children.content: 映画を見たほうがいい "You should watch the movie" Stronger recommendation

children.heading: といい (hope/wish)
children.content: 映画を見るといい "It would be good if you watched the movie" Gentler wish

children.heading: Using ない form
children.content: やめたらどう？ "How about quitting?" 行かないほうがいいよ "You shouldn't go" (stronger) 無理しないほうがいいんじゃない？ "Isn't it better not to overdo it?"

children.heading: じゃない？
children.content: 休んだほうがいいんじゃない？ "Wouldn't it be better to rest?" More tentative than たらどう

children.heading: してみたら？
children.content: やってみたら？ "Why don't you try it?" Emphasizes trying

children.heading: Basic
children.content: 休んだらどう？ "How about resting?" 医者に行ったらどうですか "How about going to the doctor?" 相談したらどう？ "How about consulting?"

children.heading: Intermediate
children.content: 疲れてるみたいだから、今日は早く帰ったらどうですか "You look tired, so how about going home early today?" その仕事が嫌なら、転職を考えたらどう？ "If you don't like that job, how about considering a job change?" 試験が心配なら、もっと勉強したらどうですか "If you're worried about the exam, how about studying more?"

children.heading: Advanced
children.content: ずっと一人で悩んでないで、誰かに相談したらどうですか "Instead of worrying alone all the time, how about consulting someone?" そんなに忙しいなら、一度ゆっくり休暇を取ったらいかがですか "If you're that busy, how about taking a nice vacation once?" お互いのために、もう一度よく話し合ってみたらどうでしょうか "For both your sakes, how about trying to talk it through carefully once more?"

sections.heading: Related Grammar Points
sections.content: 〜たほうがいい - Should/had better 〜といい - It would be good if 〜たらいい - Would be good if 〜ませんか - Won't you (invitation) Conditional たら - If/when Giving advice - Advice patterns

examples.sentence: 〜といい - It would be good if
〜たらいい - Would be good if
